case.title: Summertime Foot Fun (Manhattan)
case.text:
I'm looking to see if there are any nice girls that appreciate a guy with a foot fetish. While I have no issues with women to speak of, I've found it hard to find girls that are interested in the whole foot fetish thing. I'm very subdued about the whole thing; I haven't opened up to anyone about this except for a few past girlfriends.
I'm a SWM, fit, healthy, good looking, and by all means a down to earth guy. I'm not looking for anything serious. Would just like to meet to see if we had any chemistry and then take it from there.
You should be HWP, White, Asian or Latina.
If you're a girl that would be interested in this, email me with a picture and description of yourself. No Pros, or anyone asking for a "donation".
Please include "foot" in the subject line of your email.
Hope to hear from you!
